Tuscon grits his teeth as Lamia sinks her fangs into his neck, yet at the s=
ame time with very sharp reflexes, he grips her neck and now concentrates h=
is all wheel drive system into delivering power to his arms, thus giving hi=
m extra grip in his hands.  Now she had really made him mad, and he wasn't =
about to hold back on his abilities any further.  So with what strength he =
has, before her venom takes full effect, his fingers become a powerful vise=
 around her, tightening very quickly and not letting go.  He also knew wher=
e to grip, and could feel the pulse around her neck.  

" That - was - not =
very nice!"  

He pries her off and holds her, still tightening his vise ar=
ound her neck.

"All right Nightstrike!  Here's the deal!  You struck me fi=
rst so now I can strike back!  You want pain?!  I'LL GIVE IT TO YOU!   STAR=
TING WITH YOUR LITTLE FRIEND HERE!"

His sonar systems quickly convert to f=
ull fledged EMP wave conductors as he now ups the signal comming from the u=
nit on his helmet, creating a highly conductive and powerful electromagneti=
c field that only he is accustomed to.  If he was going to take them down h=
e was going to do it right.  He also casts Lamia asside making sure that th=
e throw is up against a heavy object.  He was sick and tired of playing gam=
es and now knew he had no choice but to go into full fledged combat mode.  =
First he had to neutralize the wound on his neck. And as he had done for hi=
s foot, he does the same for his neck. 

He scans with thermal scanners to =
find Nightstrike, and then gets right up to him and puts a gripping hand ar=
ound the back of his neck, like a powerful vice!

" If it weren't for the f=
act that you're useful for questioning, I would treat you like a piece of t=
rash in a compactor! "

With another free hand he had, he swiftly produces =
a pair of stasis cuffs and cuffs him quickly.  He then re opens the door fo=
r Talon.

"It's all right, you can come in now. "

He casts an ear down to =
Nightstrike.

"As for you, you think I'm playing dirty now, just wait until=
 we get you back to the ship!"  

He then points his ear in Talon's directi=
on.

"Talon, I think Lamia is somewhere in the corner, be sure to put these=
 on her too."

He tosses her a pair of stasis cuffs.  Being an Autobot he h=
ad full access to a lot of crime fighting supplies.  He now tries desperate=
ly to catch his breath.  They had given him a run for his servos, and left =
him with damages in need of repair.  Yet, through that, he was glad to get =
back into active duty.
